20110105171807.000|20110105171809.000|TR0|they could live to regret it in two or 
20110105171809.000|20110105171811.000|TR0|four years.
20110105171811.000|20110105171813.000|TR0|
20110105171813.000|20110105171815.000|TR0|ERICK ERICKSON, CNN POLITICAL CONTRIBUTOR: 
20110105171815.000|20110105171817.000|TR0| Very much so.  The irony here is that 
20110105171817.000|20110105171819.000|TR0|just five years ago, when the Republicans 
20110105171819.000|20110105171821.000|TR0|were trying to push through George Bush's
